definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Above the crashing roar, he could hear co-workers crying and gasping for breath.
sentences.chinese: 轰鸣声中，他听到同事在哭喊，在大声喘气。

sentences.english: On the paper shade two or three others rest, panting.
sentences.chinese: 两三个却休息在灯的纸罩上喘气。

sentences.english: "As soon as we rolled him over, he gasped and started crying, " Harmon says.
sentences.chinese: “我们把他翻过来，他一边喘气一边哭”哈蒙说。

sentences.english: If you’re huffing and puffing, you went too fast.
sentences.chinese: 如果大喘气，那说明你跑太快了。

sentences.english: He stands there panting, just out of range of the hydra heads.
sentences.chinese: 他站在蛇树的头部的袭击范围外直喘气。

sentences.english: When I became prime minister I took on too much and hardly had a break.
sentences.chinese: 当我成为首相，我的负担太重，几乎没有喘气的时间。

sentences.english: The waves continued to pound violently, forcing me underwater and gasping for air.
sentences.chinese: 浪头继续狂暴地怒吼，我载浮载沉，不断张口喘气。

sentences.english: Two or three of them still rested on the cover of the lamp .
sentences.chinese: 两三个却休息在灯的纸罩上喘气。

sentences.english: The priest and altar boy gasp, as the woman in the matching green shoes and dress sits with her legs slightly spread apart.
sentences.chinese: 她慢慢的叉开了双腿，神父和祭祀的男孩直喘气。

sentences.english: He gasped, then tried to turn his head toward the man leaning over him.
sentences.chinese: 他喘气，然后尝试转在他上的对于男人的他头倾斜。

sentences.english: She gasps as they calm down.
sentences.chinese: 她在喘气，他们冷静下来。

sentences.english: Don't take a deep breath. Please tell me immediately what happened.
sentences.chinese: 别大喘气，快点儿告诉我那里发生了什么事。

sentences.english: Was breathing very difficult patients, can not lie flat to sleep at night, only sitting breath.
sentences.chinese: 患者感到喘气很困难，夜里不能躺平睡，只能坐着喘。

sentences.english: We can huff, puff and blow the paper boats across.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以恫吓，喘气摘要船穿越。

sentences.english: She turns back to her desk and gasps.
sentences.chinese: 她回到自己的桌旁并且在喘气。

sentences.english: Any person waking from a nightmare will sit  bolt  upright and  pant.
sentences.chinese: 所有从噩梦中醒来的人都会坐直，大口喘气。

definition: to gasp for breath/to take a breather
out of breath (idiom)/to gasp for air
pinyin: shang4 qi4 bu4 jie1 xia4 qi4

definition: to breathe heavily like an ox (idiom)/to huff and puff
big mouthful (of food, drink, smoke etc)/open mouth/gulping/gobbling/gaping
to get one's breath back/to take a breather
(onom.) sound of the wind or the breathing of sb who is sound asleep
